name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Elon Musks Dad Seeks To Make 200
text:
Synopsis
Errol Musk is attempting to raise $200 million through a Solana-based memecoin called "Musk It", leveraging the Musk family name while claiming no direct involvement from Elon Musk.

Key Insights
- Errol Musk and tech consultant Nathan Browne are seeking to raise $150-$200 million from the "Musk It" memecoin
- The memecoin has gained over 400% in value in the last 24 hours following Errol Musk's endorsement
- The project's website uses imagery of SpaceX and Tesla to create association with Elon Musk
- Errol Musk plans to use proceeds to fund the Musk Institute, a new for-profit think tank
- Grayscale launched a Dogecoin Trust for accredited investors
- Purpose Investments filed a preliminary prospectus for the world's first spot XRP ETF in Canada
- A UK crypto gang was sentenced to a collective 76 years in prison for kidnapping and cryptocurrency extortion
- Uniswap V4 went live, introducing new features like "hooks" and improved capital efficiency
